response.name: Ellie the Dog
response.text: Please take me on a walk.

response.name: Shawn
response.text: It was convenient and cost the same as taking my cleaning to the cleaners myself. It makes sense.

response.name: Brooke
response.text: I found Snazzy to be reliable and they did a great job with even my tough clothes. Delivery saves me time and allows me to focus on what's important.
